Curator's Notes.notes: Archguns are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Archmelees are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Archwings are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Companions are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.
Frames are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

Ack & Brunt.name: Ack & Brunt
Ack & Brunt.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Amphis.name: Amphis
Amphis.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very high attack speed.

Anku.name: Anku
Anku.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Ankyros Prime.name: Ankyros Prime
Ankyros Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very high attack speed.

Arca Titron.name: Arca Titron
Arca Titron.stancenotes: Third hit of Smashing Fury procs slam bonus from passive but doesn't expend charges.
Arca Titron.wepnotes: Very high damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. Kills grant up to 10 Capacitor (+100% electricity damage) charges that is used on next slam attack. Slams also proc electricity and overrides hammer ragdoll.

Atterax.name: Atterax
Atterax.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed.

Bo Prime.name: Bo Prime
Bo Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Broken Scepter.name: Broken Scepter
Broken Scepter.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Can Drain enemies to spawn health/energy orb.

Broken War.name: Broken War
Broken War.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Cassowar.name: Cassowar
Cassowar.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Caustacyst.combo: Charge Attack (finisher proc) or Dying Light
Caustacyst.name: Caustacyst
Caustacyst.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Charge attack throws wave of Corrosive damage, staggers enemies and causes guaranteed slash proc on direct contact.

Ceramic Dagger.name: Ceramic Dagger
Ceramic Dagger.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. âœª

Cerata.name: Cerata
Cerata.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Cobra & Crane.name: Cobra & Crane
Cobra & Crane.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Cronus.name: Cronus
Cronus.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Dakra Prime.name: Dakra Prime
Dakra Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Dark Split-Sword.name: Dark Split-Sword
Dark Split-Sword.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. Heavy blade mode is severely underpowered. âœª

Dark Sword.name: Dark Sword
Dark Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Destreza Prime.name: Destreza Prime
Destreza Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. âœª

Dex Dakra.name: Dex Dakra
Dex Dakra.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Dragon Nikana.name: Dragon Nikana
Dragon Nikana.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Dual Ether.name: Dual Ether
Dual Ether.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Dual Heat Swords.name: Dual Heat Swords
Dual Heat Swords.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Slam attacks procs Heat in an AOE.

Dual Ichor.name: Dual Ichor
Dual Ichor.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Ties with Nami Skyla Prime. âœª

Dual Kamas Prime.name: Dual Kamas Prime
Dual Kamas Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed.

Dual Keres.name: Dual Keres
Dual Keres.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Good balance of speed and crit. âœª

Dual Raza.name: Dual Raza
Dual Raza.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. âœª

Dual Skana.name: Dual Skana
Dual Skana.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed.

Dual Zoren.name: Dual Zoren
Dual Zoren.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Zorencoptering, anyone? âœª

Endura.name: Endura
Endura.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Ether Daggers.name: Ether Daggers
Ether Daggers.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. âœª

Ether Reaper.name: Ether Reaper
Ether Reaper.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed.

Ether Sword.name: Ether Sword
Ether Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Slam attacks procs Radiation in an AOE.

Falcor.name: Falcor
Falcor.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Fang Prime.name: Fang Prime
Fang Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Fragor Prime.name: Fragor Prime
Fragor Prime.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Fragor Prime.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Furax Wraith.name: Furax Wraith
Furax Wraith.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Galatine Prime.name: Galatine Prime
Galatine Prime.wepnotes: High damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed.

Galvacord.name: Galvacord
Galvacord.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Garuda's Talons.name: Garuda's Talons
Garuda's Talons.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Gazal Machete.name: Gazal Machete
Gazal Machete.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Can be paired with Djinn's Fatal Attraction for approximately 16.6% uptime. âœª

Glaive Prime.name: Glaive Prime
Glaive Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. âœª

Gram Prime.name: Gram Prime
Gram Prime.wepnotes: Very high damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. âœª

Guandao.name: Guandao
Guandao.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Gunsen.name: Gunsen
Gunsen.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed.

Halikar.name: Halikar
Halikar.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed. Thrown attacks can disarm opponents.

Hate.name: Hate
Hate.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Heat Dagger.name: Heat Dagger
Heat Dagger.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed. Slam attacks deal Heat damage and have high chance of proccing Heat.

Heat Sword.name: Heat Sword
Heat Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. âœª

Heliocor.name: Heliocor
Heliocor.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Heliocor.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Gives one codex scan upon kill.

Hirudo.name: Hirudo
Hirudo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Upon crit, heal you for 5% of damage dealt, and gives up to 5 stacks of Invigorate (+5% max health, 15s).

Jat Kittag.name: Jat Kittag
Jat Kittag.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Jat Kittag.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Vulcan Blitz cause kills to explode dealing 300 (+60% of enemy health) Blast damage in 6m radius. Part of the Tenno Space Program.

Jat Kusar.name: Jat Kusar
Jat Kusar.stancenotes: Alt combo= Heart of the Naga; +DPS, -execution, -ragdolls
Jat Kusar.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Jaw Sword.name: Jaw Sword
Jaw Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Blade of Truth increases damage by 100% and gives Truth (Gas, health, parkour) effects.

Kama.name: Kama
Kama.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed.

Karyst.name: Karyst
Karyst.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed.

Kesheg.name: Kesheg
Kesheg.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Kestrel.name: Kestrel
Kestrel.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Entropy Flight grants +140% flight speed and Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects.

Kogake Prime.name: Kogake Prime
Kogake Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Increases movement speed by 5% when equipped.

Kreska.name: Kreska
Kreska.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed.

Krohkur.name: Krohkur
Krohkur.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed.

Kronen Prime.name: Kronen Prime
Kronen Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. âœª

Lacera.name: Lacera
Lacera.stancenotes: Alt combo= Heart of the Naga; +DPS, -execution, -ragdolls
Lacera.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. âœª

Lesion.name: Lesion
Lesion.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. Causing status proc buffs the weapon to give it 15% more innate attack speed and toxin damage.

Machete Wraith.name: Machete Wraith
Machete Wraith.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed. âœª

Mios.name: Mios
Mios.stancenotes: Alt combo= Heart of the Naga; +DPS, -execution, -ragdolls
Mios.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed.

Mire.name: Mire
Mire.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Innate +10% toxin damage boost. Toxic Blight increases toxin damage by 100% and causes Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects.

Nami Skyla Prime.name: Nami Skyla Prime
Nami Skyla Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. Ties with Dual Ichor. âœª

Nami Solo.name: Nami Solo
Nami Solo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. âœª

Nikana Prime.name: Nikana Prime
Nikana Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Ninkondi.name: Ninkondi
Ninkondi.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed. âœª

Ohma.name: Ohma
Ohma.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. Slams have guaranteed Electricity proc in 8.5m radius.

Okina.name: Okina
Okina.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed. âœª

Orthos Prime.name: Orthos Prime
Orthos Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Orvius.name: Orvius
Orvius.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed. Channeled throw suspends enemies in midair.

Pangolin Sword.name: Pangolin Sword
Pangolin Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Jump attacks always proc Electricity.

Paracesis.name: Paracesis
Paracesis.wepnotes: Very high damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Has max modslot of 90 including stance. Using forma on this weapon will increase damage to Tau faction (up to 60% after 5 forma).

Plasma Sword.name: Plasma Sword
Plasma Sword.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very low attack speed.

Prisma Dual Cleavers.name: Prisma Dual Cleavers
Prisma Dual Cleavers.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Augment adds Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects and +100% to base damage. âœª

Prisma Obex.name: Prisma Obex
Prisma Obex.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, very high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Entropy Detonation cause ground finisher kills to explode for 1,000 (+20% enemy max health) Blast damage and Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) effects.

Prisma Skana.name: Prisma Skana
Prisma Skana.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Bright Purity adds 100% melee damage and Purity (Corrosive, health) effects.

Prova Vandal.name: Prova Vandal
Prova Vandal.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Slam attacks always proc Electricity. Static Discharge deals 80% of weapon damage as Electricity damage to nearby enemies.

Pupacyst.name: Pupacyst
Pupacyst.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Rakta Dark Dagger.name: Rakta Dark Dagger
Rakta Dark Dagger.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Can use the Gleaming Blight augment. Blight (Viral, energy, movement speed) effects. While wielded, enemies have reduced detection radius. Radiation procs restore shields and may grant overshields.

Reaper Prime.name: Reaper Prime
Reaper Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Redeemer Prime.name: Redeemer Prime
Redeemer Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. âœª

Ripkas.name: Ripkas
Ripkas.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed. Hunter's Bonesaw increases damage by 90% and status chance by 60% on grounded enemies.

Sancti Magistar.name: Sancti Magistar
Sancti Magistar.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Sancti Magistar.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Innate 10% Blast effect proc. Reduces damage from status effects by 75%. Charge attacks heals nearby allies based on damage dealt.

Sarpa.name: Sarpa
Sarpa.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. âœª

Scindo Prime.name: Scindo Prime
Scindo Prime.wepnotes: High damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Scoliac.name: Scoliac
Scoliac.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Secura Lecta.name: Secura Lecta
Secura Lecta.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, high attack speed. Killing an enemy with this weapon equipped gives bonus credits.

Serro.name: Serro
Serro.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Shaku.name: Shaku
Shaku.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency.

Sheev.name: Sheev
Sheev.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed. Slam attacks guarantees heat proc.

Sibear.name: Sibear
Sibear.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Sibear.wepnotes: High damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Charge attacks gives +50% status chance for 4s.

Sigma & Octantis.name: Sigma & Octantis
Sigma & Octantis.wepnotes: The curator has exhausted all attempts at time travel.

Silva & Aegis Prime.name: Silva & Aegis Prime
Silva & Aegis Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very low attack speed. Blocking adds up to 4 charges that increases critical and status chance by 15% additively. Avenging Truth absorbs 50% of incoming damage and releases it on the next charge attack and Truth (Gas, health, parkour) effects.

Skiajati.name: Skiajati
Skiajati.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, very high attack speed. Grants invisibility upon finisher, which will expire when attacking, using an ability, or after 5s.

Synoid Heliocor.name: Synoid Heliocor
Synoid Heliocor.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Synoid Heliocor.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, poor DPS, high attack speed. Scans kills into codex, and if the target's Codex entry is complete it will create a friendly Spectre of said target. Spectre lasts 30s.

Tatsu.name: Tatsu
Tatsu.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed.

Tekko.name: Tekko
Tekko.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, poor DPS, low attack speed.

Telos Boltace.name: Telos Boltace
Telos Boltace.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Slide attack triggers Stormpath, which vacuums enemies in a 14m radius. Retriggering Stormpath within 8s puts it into a 6s cooldown and ragdoll enemies. Also gives 20% boost to parkour.

Tipedo Prime.name: Tipedo Prime
Tipedo Prime.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, very high attack speed. âœª

Tonbo.name: Tonbo
Tonbo.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. âœª

Twin Basolk.name: Twin Basolk
Twin Basolk.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Rift Strike teleports user to a target within 25m on charge attack. âœª

Twin Krohkur.name: Twin Krohkur
Twin Krohkur.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Lower crit and speed hamper scaling in extreme situations. âœª

Vaykor Sydon.name: Vaykor Sydon
Vaykor Sydon.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, high attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Blocking adds up to 15 stacks, which will emit Radial Blind in a 15m radius for 5s upon reaching the 15th stack. Also adds 50% resistance to knockdown/knockback.

Venka Prime.name: Venka Prime
Venka Prime.wepnotes: Very low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, high attack speed. Has 50% more melee combo multiplier; excellent for Blood Rush and Weeping Wounds. Stance has unusual 2x multiplier on slide.

Volnus.name: Volnus
Volnus.stancenotes: Only use Raging Whirlwind to proc Impact or the slam will ragdoll
Volnus.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very high attack speed.

War.name: War
War.wepnotes: High damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. What is it good for?

Zenistar.name: Zenistar
Zenistar.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, very low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Charge attack deploys flying disc that deals AOE damage and allow the rest of the weapon to deal physical damage.

Zaw - Ablation.name: Staff Zaw - Ablation
Zaw - Ablation.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Plague Keewar, Seekalla, and Ekwana II Jai zaw. âœª

Zaw - Atgeir.name: Polearm Zaw - Atgeir
Zaw - Atgeir.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Suffers from poor consistency. Cyath, Shtung, and Ekwana II Jai zaw. âœª

Zaw - Carnwennan.name: Dagger Zaw - Carnwennan
Zaw - Carnwennan.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. Balla, Peye, and Vargeet II Jai zaw.

Zaw - Dainsleif.name: Sword Zaw - Dainsleif
Zaw - Dainsleif.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, monstrous DPS, low attack speed. Mewan, Korb, and Vargeet II Jai zaw.

Zaw - de Carranza.name: Rapier Zaw - de Carranza
Zaw - de Carranza.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Plague Kripath, Korb, and Vargeet II Jai zaw. âœª

Zaw - Dojigiri.name: Nikana Zaw - Dojigiri
Zaw - Dojigiri.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Sepfahn, Korb, and Vargeet II Jai zaw.

Zaw - Hrunting.name: Heavy Blade Zaw - Hrunting
Zaw - Hrunting.wepnotes: High damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Dokrahm, Shtung, and Ekwana II Jai zaw. âœª

Zaw - Mah-alleinir.name: Hammer Zaw - Mah-alleinir
Zaw - Mah-alleinir.wepnotes: High damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Rabvee, Shtung, and Ekwana II Jai zaw. âœª

Zaw - Non Timetis Messor.name: Scythe Zaw - Non Timetis Messor
Zaw - Non Timetis Messor.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, moderate DPS, low attack speed. Plague Keewar, Korb, and Ekwana II Jai zaw.

Zaw - Ulfberht.name: Machete Zaw - Ulfberht
Zaw - Ulfberht.wepnotes: Low damage per hit, insane dps, low attack speed. Rabvee, Korb, and Vargeet II Ruhang zaw. âœª

Amprex.name: Amprex
Amprex.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. Beam chains to nearby enemies giving it decent AOE.

Arca Plasmor.name: Arca Plasmor
Arca Plasmor.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Single pellet is wide with punchthrough and therefore can act as AOE and reliably proc status effects. Does not have a headshot multiplier.

Argonak.name: Argonak
Argonak.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Scoping highlights enemies for easier targetting. Alternate between semi-auto (higher DPS) and full-auto (higher fire rate) to deal with different enemies. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Astilla.name: Astilla
Astilla.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, projectile munitions. Deals 30% of damage upon impact and 70% on explosion. âœª

Attica.name: Attica
Attica.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Battacor.name: Battacor
Battacor.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps, projectile munitions. Primary fire has two-round burst which is potentially wasteful. Every kill gives one secondary fire charge. Up to three charges can be stored for greater damage and crit chance. Recommend to expend secondary fire as soon as possible as it is a free shot and would increase overall DPS. âœª

Baza.name: Baza
Baza.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Completely silent but has damage falloff similar to shotguns.

Boar Prime.name: Boar Prime
Boar Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Required to mod for 100% status chance. âœª

Boltor Prime.name: Boltor Prime
Boltor Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Braton Prime.name: Braton Prime
Braton Prime.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions.

Burston Prime.name: Burston Prime
Burston Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Gilded Truth (Arbiters of Hexis) increases fire rate and provide Truth effect (Gas, health, parkour).

Buzlok.name: Buzlok
Buzlok.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire launches tracer beacon which gives additive 50% Crit Chance (20 seconds) that remain active even the target is dead. Has insane DPS potential but difficult to attain due to difficulty in handling beacon and relatively poor handling. Suffers from relatively poor consistency. âœª

Cernos Prime.name: Cernos Prime
Cernos Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire toggles firing pattern between horizontal and vertical (+50% headshot damage).

Convectrix.name: Convectrix
Convectrix.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, beam munitions. Primary fire brings the beam from wide to narrow while alt fire sweeps the beam. Alt fire sweeps the beam from narrow to wide instead and is useful for applying status effects to large crowds. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Corinth.name: Corinth
Corinth.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt fire is useful when the reload button is harder to reach than the secondary fire button. Reload should be done when clip is empty as there is a delay between reloading and firing, but the gains should be minimal.

Daikyu.name: Daikyu
Daikyu.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Dera Vandal.name: Dera Vandal
Dera Vandal.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Drakgoon.name: Drakgoon
Drakgoon.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Dread.name: Dread
Dread.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Exergis.name: Exergis
Exergis.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions.

Ferrox.name: Ferrox
Ferrox.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Munition shot the moment it is fully charged. Alt fire should be used to reduce reliance on primary weapons.

Flux Rifle.name: Flux Rifle
Flux Rifle.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, beam munitions.

Glaxion.name: Glaxion
Glaxion.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, beam munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Harpak.name: Harpak
Harpak.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. Alt fire launches a harpoon can be used to drag enemies closer. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Hema.name: Hema
Hema.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Heals warframe on headshots. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Hind.name: Hind
Hind.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt fire has better DPS on paper but due to low fire rate it still doesn't do enough.

Ignis Wraith.name: Ignis Wraith
Ignis Wraith.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. AOE works like how you'd imagine an actual flamethrower would.

Javlok.name: Javlok
Javlok.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire creats a localized explosion. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Karak Wraith.name: Karak Wraith
Karak Wraith.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Kohm.name: Kohm
Kohm.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Spool up increases bullets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs as well as having insane innate punchthrough. Riven disposition is relatively high for DPS potential and can help reach 100% status chance. Suffers from relatively poor consistency. âœª

Lanka.name: Lanka
Lanka.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Chance (20%/30%/50%). Innate Electric damage and high direct damage potential makes the Lanka the choice weapon for Eidolon hunting.

Latron Prime.name: Latron Prime
Latron Prime.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions.

Latron Wraith.name: Latron Wraith
Latron Wraith.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Lenz.name: Lenz
Lenz.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, projectile munitions. Each arrow procs procs Impact on direct hit, Cold AOE immediately afterwards, and finally Blast AOE explosion.

Miter.name: Miter
Miter.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Neutralizing Justice can instantly destroy nullifier bubbles and has Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Mutalist Cernos.name: Mutalist Cernos
Mutalist Cernos.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Fully charged arrows leave a gas trail that continues to proc status effects. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Mutalist Quanta.name: Mutalist Quanta
Mutalist Quanta.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire creats a bubble that can be combined up to three times. Firing through the bubble increase damage and critical chance.

Nagantaka.name: Nagantaka
Nagantaka.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Headshots have a chance to increase reload speed. Secondary fire empties clip with little additional recoil and is highly recommended.

Ogris.name: Ogris
Ogris.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Nightwatch Napalm turns the Ogris into an area denial weapon. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Opticor.name: Opticor
Opticor.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Do not stare directly into beam. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Opticor Vandal.name: Opticor Vandal
Opticor Vandal.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, âœª

Panthera.name: Panthera
Panthera.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt-fire puts a spinning blade a few meters in from of the weapon that constantly spin and deal damage.

Paracyst.name: Paracyst
Paracyst.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Three-round burst is wasteful at times.

Paris Prime.name: Paris Prime
Paris Prime.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Phage.name: Phage
Phage.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, beam munitions. Scoping narrows down the beam to a single point. âœª

Phantasma.name: Phantasma
Phantasma.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. Primary fire has usable AOE. Alt fire charges the weapon to fire an exploding glob that also releases seeking projectiles. Longer charge imparts more damage. âœª

Prisma Gorgon.name: Prisma Gorgon
Prisma Gorgon.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Roll for recoil reduction in riven. âœª

Prisma Grakata.name: Prisma Grakata
Prisma Grakata.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. âœª

Prisma Grinlok.name: Prisma Grinlok
Prisma Grinlok.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Augment adds 200% CC and Sequence (Radiation, Shields, Max Shields) âœª

Prisma Tetra.name: Prisma Tetra
Prisma Tetra.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Quanta Vandal.name: Quanta Vandal
Quanta Vandal.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, beam munitions. Could do with punchthrough but build is tight as it is. Alt fire useful to learn Euclidean geometry. âœª

Quartakk.name: Quartakk
Quartakk.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Four-shot burst is wasteful at times.

Rakta Cernos.name: Rakta Cernos
Rakta Cernos.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Good syndicate proc (Viral + energy restore) but doesn't do much for DPS since effective fire-rate for bows are low.

Rubico Prime.name: Rubico Prime
Rubico Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is amazing (min. 1), zooming in gives additive bonus to Crit Multiplier (35%/50%). High direct damage potential and smooth handling makes Rubico Prime a popular choice for Eidolon Hunting.

Sancti Tigris.name: Sancti Tigris
Sancti Tigris.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Purity (Corrosive, health) effect can be useful. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Scourge.name: Scourge
Scourge.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions. Alt fire creates a localized bullet attractor field on nearby enemies' head.

Secura Penta.name: Secura Penta
Secura Penta.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Snipetron Vandal.name: Snipetron Vandal
Snipetron Vandal.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is average (min. 3), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (30%/50%). âœª

Sobek.name: Sobek
Sobek.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Shattering Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) can make it reach 100% status chance while Acid Shells can be used to provide some AOE damage.

Soma Prime.name: Soma Prime
Soma Prime.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Best paired with Frost Prime and Scindo Prime.

Stradavar Prime.name: Stradavar Prime
Stradavar Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Can alternate between semi-auto (better DPS) and full-auto (useful for breaking nullifier bubbles). Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Strun Wraith.name: Strun Wraith
Strun Wraith.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Required to mod for 100% status chance. âœª

Supra Vandal.name: Supra Vandal
Supra Vandal.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Entropy Burst (Magnetic, Energy) can greatly increase status chance.

Sybaris Prime.name: Sybaris Prime
Sybaris Prime.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Two-round burst is wasteful at times and the magazine is relatively small for how fast it fires.

Synapse.name: Synapse
Synapse.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps, beam munitions. âœª

Synoid Simulor.name: Synoid Simulor
Synoid Simulor.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions.

Telos Boltor.name: Telos Boltor
Telos Boltor.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, projectile munitions. Truth (Gas, health, parkour) syndicate proc is helpful at times.

Tenora.name: Tenora
Tenora.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Has a decent alt-fire that can be used to take down medium units quickly. Light units and heavy units should still be dealt with using primary fire.

Tiberon Prime.name: Tiberon Prime
Tiberon Prime.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt-fire toggles between 3-round burst, semi-auto, and auto. Testing so far shows that burst fire has 5% edge on DPS compared to semi-auto at the expense of ammo economy. âœª

Tigris Prime.name: Tigris Prime
Tigris Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Duplex trigger might take a while to get used to. Required to mod for 100% status chance. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Tonkor.name: Tonkor
Tonkor.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Grenades can cause self damage. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Torid.name: Torid
Torid.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. Thing fired stick on surfaces/targets and continue to emit gas that deals damage and causes status effects.

Vaykor Hek.name: Vaykor Hek
Vaykor Hek.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Justice (Blast, Health, Armor) effects can be useful.

Vectis Prime.name: Vectis Prime
Vectis Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is slow (min. 5), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%).

Veldt.name: Veldt
Veldt.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS, hit-scan munitions. Alt-fire toggles higher magnification on zoom.

Vulkar Wraith.name: Vulkar Wraith
Vulkar Wraith.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS, hit-scan munitions. Sniper combo counter rampup is very good (min. 2), zooming in gives additive bonus to headshots (35%/55%/70%). âœª

Zarr.name: Zarr
Zarr.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS, projectile munitions. First explosion from primary fire can damage self but subsequent cluster bomblets won't. Each bomblet can cause status effect on it's own. Alt fire switches to shotgun mode. Suffers from relatively poor consistency.

Zenith.name: Zenith
Zenith.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS, hit-scan munitions. Secondary fire launches a disc that scans enemies and switches the weapon to semi-auto. Semi-auto mode has more DPS and infinite punchthrough. âœª

Zhuge.name: Zhuge
Zhuge.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS, projectile munitions.

Curator's Notes.notes: Schools are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

Acrid.name: Acrid
Acrid.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions. Each flechette delivers toxin DoT (scales with modified base damage and toxin damage) regardless of elemental modding.

Afuris.name: Afuris
Afuris.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Akbolto Prime.name: Akbolto Prime
Akbolto Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Keep your friends close; keep your enemies closer. Because bolts have travel time.

Akbronco Prime.name: Akbronco Prime
Akbronco Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Akjagara Prime.name: Akjagara Prime
Akjagara Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. âœª

Aklato.name: Aklato
Aklato.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Aklex Prime.name: Aklex Prime
Aklex Prime.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Massive recoil hurts overall DPS. Suffers from poor consistency.

Akmagnus.name: Akmagnus
Akmagnus.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Aksomati.name: Aksomati
Aksomati.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. âœª

Akstiletto Prime.name: Akstiletto Prime
Akstiletto Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Very good all-rounder secondary.

Akvasto Prime.name: Akvasto Prime
Akvasto Prime.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. âœª

Akzani.name: Akzani
Akzani.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Arca Scisco.name: Arca Scisco
Arca Scisco.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Each shot landed grants Target Analysis buff. Target Analysis stacks up to 5 times, lasting 2 seconds each. Critical Chance and Status Chance increases by 4% per stack.

Atomos.name: Atomos
Atomos.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Chains 7m away, even when shooting at dead bodies.

Azima.name: Azima
Azima.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Alt fire launches the remaining clip that will act as a 4-point dumb turret. âœª

Ballistica Prime.name: Ballistica Prime
Ballistica Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Charged shot kills turns the target into a ghostly specter for 7 seconds.

Brakk.name: Brakk
Brakk.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. RIP Raids.

Bronco Prime.name: Bronco Prime
Bronco Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Cycron.name: Cycron
Cycron.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  beam munitions. Does not have an ammo reserve. Ammo in clip regenerates over time when not firing.

Despair.name: Despair
Despair.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions.

Dex Furis.name: Dex Furis
Dex Furis.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Despite being called the Furis, it uses the Afuris riven. Suffers from poor consistency.

Dual Toxocyst.name: Dual Toxocyst
Dual Toxocyst.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Headshot grants Frenzy buff. Frenzy lasts 3 seconds and can be refreshed. Frenzy grants 100% increase in Toxin damage (on base damage), 15% increase in fire rate, recoil reduction, and doesn't consume ammo while firing. Suffers from poor consistency.

Embolist.name: Embolist
Embolist.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  beam munitions. âœª

Euphona Prime.name: Euphona Prime
Euphona Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Alt-fire switches to multi-pellet mode that can achieve 100% status chance when modded properly. However, slug mode firing has superior DPS and hybrid modding will gimp both builds.

Fusilai.name: Fusilai
Fusilai.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Alt-fire launches three throwing knives horizontally instead. âœª

Hikou Prime.name: Hikou Prime
Hikou Prime.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions.

Hystrix.name: Hystrix
Hystrix.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Bolts munitions have pros and cons. Clip is small for fire rate and despite quick reload will end up being annoying. Alt-fire changes elemental damage to one of four basic types (Fire, Ice, Poison, Electricity) with guaranteed procs which scales more if corresponding elemental mod is installed. âœª

Knell.name: Knell
Knell.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Headshot grants Death Knell buff. Death Knell can stack up to 3 times, lasting 3 seconds per stack. Stack-count regardless, 20% status chance and infinite ammo is granted. Critical Multiplier increases (x1.5, x2., x2.5) per stack. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Kraken.name: Kraken
Kraken.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Kulstar.name: Kulstar
Kulstar.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Rocket impact will release 3 additional bomblets. Suffers from poor consistency.

Kunai.name: Kunai
Kunai.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Good luck landing a precise shot.

Lato Vandal.name: Lato Vandal
Lato Vandal.notes: Low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Lex Prime.name: Lex Prime
Lex Prime.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions. Massive recoil hurts overall DPS.

Mara Detron.name: Mara Detron
Mara Detron.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions.

Nukor.name: Nukor
Nukor.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  beam munitions. Hitting a specific part multiple times increases damage dealt to that part by 5%. Unusually, Nukor has very high Critical Multiplier but poor Critical Chance, hence it's DPS increase from flat Crit Chance modifiers is relatively higher than other weapons.

Ocucor.name: Ocucor
Ocucor.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Each enemy killed will create an additional tendril that damages other targettable enemies in sight. Tendrils reset upon reloading. âœª

Pandero.name: Pandero
Pandero.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Alt-fire empties clip onto enemy with some worrying recoil.

Plinx.name: Plinx
Plinx.notes: High damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Pox.name: Pox
Pox.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Firing launches gas darts that will fill a moderate AOE with gas. Modding 100% status is highly recommended. Suffers from poor consistency.

Prisma Angstrum.name: Prisma Angstrum
Prisma Angstrum.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Multishot causes the rocket to spread out further. Can be charged to launch more rockets at once. Suffers from poor consistency.

Prisma Twin Gremlins.name: Prisma Twin Gremlins
Prisma Twin Gremlins.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. âœª

Pyrana Prime.name: Pyrana Prime
Pyrana Prime.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Killing 3 enemies within 3 seconds summons another Pyrana Prime for 5 seconds, which doubles your fire rate and current ammo (of which up to 12 remains after it is gone).

Rakta Ballistica.name: Rakta Ballistica
Rakta Ballistica.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Blight (Viral, energy, movement speed) is useful at times. Suffers from poor consistency.

Sancti Castanas.name: Sancti Castanas
Sancti Castanas.notes: Very high damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions. Purity (Corrosive, health) can be useful at times. Suffers from poor consistency.

Secura Dual Cestra.name: Secura Dual Cestra
Secura Dual Cestra.notes: Very low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  projectile munitions. Sequence (Radiation, shields) can be useful at times. âœª

Seer.name: Seer
Seer.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions.

Sicarus Prime.name: Sicarus Prime
Sicarus Prime.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Three-round burst is wasteful at times. âœª

Sonicor.name: Sonicor
Sonicor.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. The tenno space program has been replaced by the tenno ragdoll simulator. Explosions may cause status effects. Suffers from poor consistency.

Spectra.name: Spectra
Spectra.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  beam munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Spira Prime.name: Spira Prime
Spira Prime.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions.

Staticor.name: Staticor
Staticor.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Bolt and resulting explosion has independent chance to proc status effects, making it highly capable of stripping armor.

Stubba.name: Stubba
Stubba.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Stug.name: Stug
Stug.notes: Very high damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Each shot launches a blob. Up to six blobs can accumulate at a single site on the target. Alt-fire charges the weapon to launch a single, larger blob. While the shots itself does not cause status effects, the blobs do.

Synoid Gammacor.name: Synoid Gammacor
Synoid Gammacor.notes: Very low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Innate Entropy (Magnetic, Energy) is useful at times. âœª

Talons.name: Talons
Talons.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Telos Akbolto.name: Telos Akbolto
Telos Akbolto.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions. Truth (Gas, health, parkour) is useful at times.

Twin Grakatas.name: Twin Grakatas
Twin Grakatas.notes: Low damage per shot, monstrous DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Twin Kohmak.name: Twin Kohmak
Twin Kohmak.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Spool up increases pellets shot and fire rate to the point where status effects are still reliably proc'd despite using shotgun calcs. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Twin Rogga.name: Twin Rogga
Twin Rogga.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. âœª

Twin Vipers Wraith.name: Twin Vipers Wraith
Twin Vipers Wraith.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions. Suffers from poor consistency.

Tysis.name: Tysis
Tysis.notes: Low damage per shot, poor DPS,  projectile munitions.

Vasto Prime.name: Vasto Prime
Vasto Prime.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Vaykor Marelok.name: Vaykor Marelok
Vaykor Marelok.notes: High damage per shot, moderate DPS,  hitscan munitions. Justice (Blast, health, armor) can be helpful at times.

Viper Wraith.name: Viper Wraith
Viper Wraith.notes: Very low damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Zakti.name: Zakti
Zakti.notes: Very low damage per shot, moderate DPS,  projectile munitions. Pellets explode after landing, causing Impact status and Gas damage and status. Suffers from poor consistency.

Zylok.name: Zylok
Zylok.notes: High damage per shot, poor DPS,  hitscan munitions.

Catchmoon - Harbinger of Demise.name: Catchmoon - Harbinger of Demise
Catchmoon - Harbinger of Demise.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Catchmoon-Gibber-Splat kitgun. Base version without use of arcanes. No testing to be done with Pax Seeker as use case does not justify headshots (lined up target punchthrough and no headshot multiplier). Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Catchmoon - Herald of Ruination (Pax Cha.name: Catchmoon - Herald of Ruination (Pax Charge)
Catchmoon - Herald of Ruination (Pax Cha.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Catchmoon-Haymaker-Zipneedle kitgun. R3 Pax Charge. âœª

Gaze - Baleful Purifier.base: Pax Charge requires specialized build (Gaze-Haymaker-Zipneedle) but performs at Contender tier.
Gaze - Baleful Purifier.name: Gaze - Baleful Purifier
Gaze - Baleful Purifier.notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Gaze-Haymaker-Killstream kitgun. Base version without use of arcanes. âœª

Gaze - Baleful Purifier (Pax Seeker).name: Gaze - Baleful Purifier (Pax Seeker)
Gaze - Baleful Purifier (Pax Seeker).notes: Low damage per shot, insane dps,  beam munitions. Gaze-Haymaker-Killstream kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker. âœª

Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor.base: Pax Charge requires specialized build (Rattleguts-Haymaker-Zipneedle) and performs at Top tier, albeit at lower ranking.
Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor.name: Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor
Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Rattleguts-Lovetap-Splat kitgun. Base version without use of arcanes. âœª

Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor (Pax Seek.name: Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor (Pax Seeker)
Rattleguts - Thunderous Rancor (Pax Seek.notes: High damage per shot, insane dps,  hitscan munitions. Rattleguts-Lovetap-Splat kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker. âœª

Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor.base: Pax Charge requires specialized build (Tombfinger-Haymaker-Zipneedle) and performs at Top tier, albeit at lower ranking.
Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor.name: Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor
Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor.notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Tombfinger-Haymaker-Stitch kitgun. Base version without use of arcanes. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor (Pax Seeker).name: Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor (Pax Seeker)
Tombfinger - Mordant Meteor (Pax Seeker).notes: Very high damage per shot, insane dps,  projectile munitions. Tombfinger-Haymaker-Stitch kitgun. R3 Pax Seeker. Suffers from poor consistency. âœª

Curator's Notes.notes: Sentinel Weapons are currently untested. Please refer to tier list roadmap in the discord for more information.

frame.text: Frames are currently being redone. Please be patient as that part of the list is worked on.

checkTheLinks.text: Please refer to the Weapon name links for Zaws and Kitguns. Also click on the builds' link to see it.

subjectivity.name: subjectivity
subjectivity.text: This is a partially subjective tier list, however constructive criticism is always encouraged and appreciated. Before you freak out about a weapon's tier, read this disclaimer by /u/4G3NT_0R4NGE3. Nevertheless, this guide is intended to get a general sense of the equipment in the game.

ordering.name: ordering
ordering.text: Ordering of items is somewhat meaningful with the implementation of robust testing regiment. However, for Top tiered weapons (and some Contenders) they are somewhat crowded and differences could sometimes be down to less than 5% in performance.

workSoFar.name: workSoFar
workSoFar.text: Only Primary, Secondary, and Melee weapons have been thoroughly rated. Other sections, notably Warframes, have not been completed and is currently a work-in-progress.

builds.name: builds
builds.text: Builds are based on best (sometimes up to 7 forma on a single weapon) effort basis and done without rivens. Therefore it is also safe to say weapons are ranked without rivens.

dispute.name: dispute
dispute.text: If you have any issues with rankings/builds, please visit the Discord server to discuss about them.

dispo.name: disposition
dispo.text: âœª indicates a weapon that has an unusually high riven disposition for its rank.

utubechannel.name: channel
utubechannel.text: All weapon tests will be uploaded (eventually)

version: 24.5.8.1 - Added Stradavar Prime and Tipedo Prime. Updated latest Riven disposition.
